mapper.sql: oeder_id, order_nh, order_name, order_price, order_date, order_zf
mapper.insert:
insert into t_order
oeder_id,
order_nh,
order_name,
order_price,
order_date,
order_zf,

mapper.update:
update t_order
order_nh = #{orderNh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_zf = #{orderZf,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where oeder_id = #{oederId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_order set order_nh = #{orderNh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_name = #{orderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_zf = #{orderZf,jdbcType=INTEGER} where oeder_id = #{oederId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_order as a left join order_type as b on a.order_zf = b.type_id
mapper.update: update t_order set order_nh = #{orderNh},order_name = #{orderName},order_price = #{orderPrice},order_date = #{orderDate},order_zf = #{orderZf} where oeder_id = #{oederId}
